name: Domain - Negentropy - Box Press Toro Gordo
additionalNotes: Domain is a brand of cigars that stands out for its commitment to craftsmanship, tradition and the constant search for excellence. By combining the mastery of its craft with respect for traditions, Domain creates exceptional cigars with a deep cultural significance. Through meticulous attention to detail and an unwavering commitment to perfection, the brand aspires to build a reputation for producing cigars that captivate fans around the world.
